product_name: prAna Marco Polo Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The vintage-inspired, lightweight organic cotton Marco Polo shirt makes an adventurous style statement and is a comfortable choice for warm-weather fun. Organic cotton offers breathable comfort and easy care; standard fit of the prAna Marco Polo shirt skims the body with slight contours. Closeout.
